activities:
Any of the information we collect from customers may be used in one of the following ways: 

TO PERSONALIZE THE CUSTOMER'S EXPERIENCE
Customer information helps us to better respond to their individual needs.

TO IMPROVE OUR WEBSITE
We continually strive to improve our website offerings based on the information and feedback we receive from customers.

TO IMPROVE OUR CUSTOMER SERVICE
Customer information helps us to more effectively respond to our customer service requests and support needs.

TO PROCESS TRANSACTIONS
Customer information, whether public or private, will not be sold, exchanged, transferred, or given to any other company for any reason whatsoever, without their consent, other than for the express purpose of delivering the purchased product or service requested.

TO ADMINISTER ALL EMERGENETICS PROFILE SURVEYS AND OTHER SITE FEATURES

TO SEND PERIODIC EMAILS
The email address customers provide for order processing, will only be used to send them information and updates pertaining to their order.

We will only send informational update emails if customer's select Subscribe during the Profile registration process. Otherwise customers will not receive promotional emails from Emergenetics International.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, gender, address, city, state, zip code/postal code, country, company name, company size, type of business, job function, email address, phone number
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and/or the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
